programmes.name: Helios Lattice Stewardship
programmes.objective: Stitch Dyson power, orbital research, and guardian autonomy into a resilient stellar civilisation mesh.
successCriteria: Maintain ≥0.98 availability across orbital planes while scaling Dyson throughput
Keep guardian handoff latency under 10 minutes during autonomy uplifts
Preserve bridge failover buffers for ≥3 cycles during stress drills

rootTask.name: Helios Lattice Command Spine
rootTask.fallbackPlan: Fail over to Solara Earth Core and freeze new autonomy rolls until guardian council review completes.
rootTask.description: Coordinate Dyson lattice telemetry, guardian approvals, and bridge orchestration for the orbital halo.

children.name: Dyson Array Sequencer
children.fallbackPlan: Revert to last audited phasing plan and throttle deployments to 60% until stability recovers.
children.description: Phase Dyson module launches, heat rejection envelopes, and redundancy schedules with thermostat constraints.

children.name: Mirror Hub Calibration
children.fallbackPlan: Lock mirrors to safe angle setpoints and request guardian calibration override.
children.description: Tune mirror arrays for beam harmonics, jitter control, and guardian-observed safety bands.

children.name: Thermal Dump Lattice
children.fallbackPlan: Route excess heat to reserve radiators and slow beam modulation until margins return to nominal.
children.description: Deploy radiator swarms and heat rejection buffers to keep Dyson operations within safe enthalpy bands.

children.name: Interplanetary Bridge Hardening
children.fallbackPlan: Isolate affected bridges, switch to zk-light-client fallback, and page guardian council for approvals.
children.description: Fortify bridge meshes against latency spikes and packet loss while maintaining quorum proofs.

children.name: Guardian Autonomy Harmoniser
children.fallbackPlan: Pin guardians to manual review, extend coverage windows, and keep autonomy below 55% until resolved.
children.description: Synchronise guardian autonomy levels with Dyson throughput and cross-federation pause levers.

programmes.name: Luna Supply Gateway
programmes.objective: Scale regolith supply, propellant depots, and emergency buffers for the stellar lattice.
successCriteria: Maintain ≥14 days logistics buffer for Luna-to-Helios corridors
Keep hull breach risk below 0.5% per drill cycle
Sustain 0.95+ reliability on regolith and cryo supply convoys

rootTask.name: Luna Logistics Core
rootTask.fallbackPlan: Activate lunar hardening routines, slow corridor throughput by 30%, and request orbital spare capacity.
rootTask.description: Route regolith supply, depot buffering, and hull integrity monitoring for the Luna gateway.

children.name: Mass Driver Throughput
children.fallbackPlan: Throttle launches to guardian-approved cadence and divert to stored regolith buffers.
children.description: Optimise lunar mass driver cadence and debris shielding while syncing with bridge windows.

children.name: Cryogenic Buffer Network
children.fallbackPlan: Seal cryo tanks, reroute propellant from orbital reserves, and shorten exposure windows.
children.description: Extend propellant and water ice buffers to absorb Helios demand spikes with minimal boil-off.

children.name: Guardian Corridor Drills
children.fallbackPlan: Switch corridors to manual scheduling, extend buffer windows to 18 days, and dial autonomy down 10%.
children.description: Rehearse guardian-led corridor failovers and ensure Luna manifests stay synchronised with Helios.

programmes.name: Ares Terraforming Lifeline
programmes.objective: Protect Mars terraforming throughput while feeding Helios Dyson demand with stable resources.
successCriteria: Maintain ≥0.93 reliability for Mars-to-Helios mineral flows
Hold habitat resilience ≥0.96 during corridor drills
Keep autonomy uplifts below maxAutonomyBps until guardian checks clear

rootTask.name: Ares Terraforming Hub
rootTask.fallbackPlan: Shift to Deimos caches, enforce manual guardianship, and pause new terraforming domains until stable.
rootTask.description: Coordinate terraforming, logistics, and sentinel coverage to feed Dyson buildout without habitat risk.

children.name: Regolith Chain
children.fallbackPlan: Route mining to lower-risk sites and cap throughput at 70% until guardian sign-off.
children.description: Mine, refine, and ship regolith payloads coordinated with Luna and Helios corridor windows.

children.name: Habitat Shielding
children.fallbackPlan: Seal domes, shift Dyson allocation to life support, and hold autonomy steady until radiation subsides.
children.description: Harden habitats against radiation and micrometeorites while keeping terraformers in tolerance.

children.name: Dyson Feedstock Harmonisation
children.fallbackPlan: Throttle Helios demand, prioritise safety-critical habitats, and sync with Luna buffers before resuming.
children.description: Blend Mars feedstock with Luna buffers and Earth treasury guardrails to keep Dyson assembly stable.
